columns.order_date: DATE - When the order was placed
columns.category: VARCHAR(100) - Product category (Electronics, Clothing, Books, etc.)
columns.unit_price: DECIMAL(10,2) - Price per item in EUR
columns.payment_method: VARCHAR(50) - Payment type (Credit Card, PayPal, Bank Transfer)

notes: Use date() function for date comparisons
Always include LIMIT clause for large results
Total amount is always quantity * unit_price
Categories: Electronics, Clothing, Books, Home & Garden, Sports
Valid statuses: Pending, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled
